themetoggle-desc: Allows the site to create local themes. Tuned for setups with aggressive caching, where a cookie-based solution might poison the cache.
theme-auto-preference-description: Follow system preference to determine whether light or dark theme should be used
themeusage-noresults: No users with non-default theme preferences found.
themeusage-unknown-theme-tooltip: These users have an unknown theme set as their preference, possibly because the theme has since been removed. They will see the default theme instead.
